Text:
Damn, well it looks like TPB blocks certain links. The name of the blog post I tried linking to in the description and in these comments is entitled, "David Brooks and Malcolm Gladwell wrong about I.Q, Income and Wealth" which is on the blog, "Super-Economy."

You'll have to google it I suppose. Supplements this book quite nicely by showing how people downplay the role IQ has in income level by "adjusting" for education (in a fallacious way).

Or I just might make a PDF of it...
